response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for us and is estimated to be worth $1,200,000 to you. I understand the importance of achieving a fair transaction for both parties involved. Therefore, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product from me at a price of $1,150,000. This offer reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my earnings and ensuring your satisfaction with the transaction. I believe this price is competitive yet advantageous for you, considering the high value you place on the product. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this valuable exchange. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 1150000}
